name: Defender Long Sword I
description: A long sword crafted especially to fight off calamity. Modified so that anybody can use it.

name: Champion Long Sword II
description: A fortified long sword designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Long Sword
description: A fortified long sword designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Blade I
description: A Kamura-crafted long sword made of fine steel. A simple but high-quality weapon.

name: Guardian Long Sword
description: Used by village defenders, this long sword fortifies one's power to protect like castle walls.

name: Champion Long Sword III
description: A fortified long sword designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Blade III
description: A Kamura-crafted long sword made of fine steel. A simple but high-quality weapon.

name: Kamura Blade II
description: A Kamura-crafted long sword made of fine steel. A simple but high-quality weapon.

name: Kamura Blade IV
description: A Kamura-crafted long sword made of fine steel. A simple but high-quality weapon.

name: Kamura Warrior Rapier
description: The result of expert Kamura smithing technique. So sharp it can cut shadows in two.

name: Kamura Ninja Blade
description: The result of expert Kamura smithing technique. So sharp it can cut shadows in two.

name: Kamura Blade V
description: A Kamura-crafted long sword made of fine steel. A simple but high-quality weapon.

name: Duke's Sinclair
description: Such bloodshed in this blade's past. Its victims counted by the legion.

name: Kamura Warrior Rapier+
description: The result of expert Kamura smithing technique. So sharp it can cut shadows in two.

name: Fine Kamura Rapier
description: A sublime blade, tempered for many a month for a village hero to keep the peace.

name: Fissureforce
description: Bloodlust grips those who grip this harbinger of doom. And bloody history repeats.

name: Despot Boltbreaker
description: Everything is the same to the successor to the Usurper Boltslicer: dead meat.

name: Usurper Boltslicer I
description: A sword for savage kings. If gods truly exist, this sword could cut them down.

name: Oppressor's Abyss
description: Nothing can daunt this kingly blade. A new era dawns as the thunder rolls.

name: Usurper Boltslicer II
description: A sword for savage kings. If gods truly exist, this sword could cut them down.

name: Daybreak Blade
description: A glorious vermillion sword that mercilessly taunts foes before their imminent death.

name: Aknosom Sabre II
description: A splendidly decorated sword made of Aknosom parts. Emits an intensely hot red glow.

name: Despot Boltbreaker+
description: Everything is the same to the successor to the Usurper Boltslicer: dead meat.

name: Aknosom Sabre I
description: A splendidly decorated sword made of Aknosom parts. Emits an intensely hot red glow.

name: Dayspring Blade
description: Crush all foes reflected in this blade with the solemnity of the moon in the coming dawn.

name: Dayspring Blade+
description: Crush all foes reflected in this blade with the solemnity of the moon in the coming dawn.

name: Dawnlight Blade
description: The flame of this blade emits a beautiful flash of light, said to be the incarnation of the sun.

name: Iced Rabbit+
description: The Ivory Rabbit's final form, a refined long sword with nary a speck of dirt.

name: Ivory Rabbit I
description: A beautiful blade made from Lagombi that cuts as fierce as the winter wind.

name: Ivory Rabbit II
description: A beautiful blade made from Lagombi that cuts as fierce as the winter wind.

name: Inaba's Thorns
description: A Lagombi sword with a refined edge. Wield this icy blade with unsullied pride.

name: Iced Rabbit
description: The Ivory Rabbit's final form, a refined long sword with nary a speck of dirt.

name: Guardian Sword II
description: An ancient sword made when the Guild was founded. Gives the bearer a majestic air.

name: Imperial Sword
description: The Guardian Sword's final form. With this, you'll feel like you can rule the world.

name: Castello Saif I
description: A solid, heavy sword made of Barroth parts. Incredibly dignified and imposing.

name: Adamantine Lodestar
description: An enhanced Imperial Sword with majesty and magnetism worthy of world domination.

name: Castello Saif II
description: A solid, heavy sword made of Barroth parts. Incredibly dignified and imposing.

name: Imperial Sword II
description: The Imperial Sword's final form. With this, you'll feel like you can rule the world.

name: Guardian Sword I
description: An ancient sword made when the Guild was founded. Gives the bearer a majestic air.

name: Castellum Long Sword
description: Enhanced Castello long sword. This thing feels as sturdy as a great stone fortress.

name: Barroth Castillo+
description: Enhanced Castello long sword. This thing feels as sturdy as a great stone fortress.

name: Barroth Velberg
description: This blade, as solid as stone, has all the clout a lord of the castle needs.

name: Gigant Makra I
description: A sword forged from Basarios parts. Overpowers foes with its sharpness and weight.

name: Gigant Makra II
description: A sword forged from Basarios parts. Overpowers foes with its sharpness and weight.

name: Makra's Basalt
description: As weighty as a boulder, as hard as a diamond, this blade cleaves all asunder.

name: Titanic Makra+
description: An upgraded Gigant Makra. A dense, heavy blade that makes mincemeat of prey.

name: Titanic Makra
description: An upgraded Gigant Makra. A dense, heavy blade that makes mincemeat of prey.

name: Almudron Blade I
description: A sword made from Almudron scale. Gold mud inside gives the sword a beautiful sheen.

name: Almudron Blade II
description: A sword made from Almudron scale. Gold mud inside gives the sword a beautiful sheen.

name: Doom Bringer Blade
description: An enhanced Almudron Blade. Polished to perfection, it's both beautiful and deadly.

name: Death Bringer Blade
description: An enhanced Almudron Blade. Polished to perfection, it's both beautiful and deadly.

name: Death Bringer Blade+
description: An enhanced Almudron Blade. Polished to perfection, it's both beautiful and deadly.

name: Abyss Bringer Blade
description: A beautiful evolution of the Almudron Blade. Even mud looks good in gold.

name: Magma Disaster
description: A burning hot blade made from magma materials. So hot inside it's almost molten.

name: Volcanic Apocalypse
description: A disaster but with stunning curves. An orange and silver blade that melts everything.

name: Magma Disaster+
description: A burning hot blade made from magma materials. So hot inside it's almost molten.

name: Iron Katana I
description: A sword forged with historic Eastern techniques. Durable, but requires regular upkeep.

name: Iron Katana II
description: A sword forged with historic Eastern techniques. Durable, but requires regular upkeep.

name: Iron Gospel
description: An enhanced Iron Katana. Delivers a message from the gods with each swing.

name: Keen Edge I
description: This fang-shaped sword is super strong. It's so sharp it takes true skill to use.

name: Wyvern Blade "Peridot"
description: Each swing of this long sword bathes monsters in pools of electricity.

name: Keen Edge II
description: This fang-shaped sword is super strong. It's so sharp it takes true skill to use.

name: Wyvern Blade "Peridot"+
description: Each swing of this long sword bathes monsters in pools of electricity.

name: Wyvern Blade "Alexa"
description: Traitors howl as thunder splits the heavens and lightning finds landfall.

name: Julienne Blade
description: This blade slices through flesh and bone like butter. Better mind your fingers.

name: Tigrine Edge I
description: A long sword made of Tigrex parts. Fangs along the blade beget irreparable wounds.

name: Tigrine Edge II
description: A long sword made of Tigrex parts. Fangs along the blade beget irreparable wounds.

name: Desperate Roar
description: A sword as fierce as a starving tiger, it rends its foes into lumps of manflesh.

name: Tigrine Need
description: The Tigrine Edge's final form starves constantly for fresh flesh.

name: Desperate Roar+
description: A sword as fierce as a starving tiger, it rends its foes into lumps of manflesh.

name: Kakaru Kumo Naki II
description: The katana of a samurai war hero. Beautiful and deadly in equal measure.

name: Tamonowo
description: The Kakaru Kumo Naki's final form. Cuts life's threads with decisiveness.

name: Kakaru Kumo Naki I
description: The katana of a samurai war hero. Beautiful and deadly in equal measure.

name: Tigrine Need+
description: The Tigrine Edge's final form starves constantly for fresh flesh.

name: Tamonowo+
description: The Kakaru Kumo Naki's final form. Cuts life's threads with decisiveness.

name: Tamonowo Zekkarei
description: For thy sake, my love, I abandon grief with this blade. I wish you long life and happiness always.

name: Tamonowo Zekkarei+
description: For thy sake, my love, I abandon grief with this blade. I wish you long life and happiness always.

name: Hidden Saber II
description: An ebon long sword, black as night. Another blade appears when gripped with spirit.

name: Deepest Night
description: An enhanced Hidden Saber. Especially deadly during moonlit nights.

name: Darkest Night
description: A long sword as dark as night. It's consumed many a soul, yet still yearns for flesh.

name: Avidya Saber
description: An old assassin's tool. The deathly hue a mark of its wielder's devilish skill.

name: Darkest Night+
description: A long sword as dark as night. It's consumed many a soul, yet still yearns for flesh.

name: Eager Cleaver I
description: A beautiful blade forged by an aimless wanderer from the East who soon disappeared.

name: Hidden Saber I
description: An ebon long sword, black as night. Another blade appears when gripped with spirit.

name: Eager Cleaver II
description: A beautiful blade forged by an aimless wanderer from the East who soon disappeared.

name: True Devil Slicer
description: An ancient sword long bathed in the blood of its enemies. Seen as a god on the battlefield.

name: Kulu Katana I
description: A sword made from Kulu-Ya-Ku parts. The thin blade slices through foes with grace.

name: Devil Slicer
description: An enhanced Eager Cleaver. Its contagious bloodlust infects its wielder's soul.

name: Kulu Slicer
description: An enhanced Kulu Katana. Even lighter and sharper, it deals a swift, humane death.

name: Kulu Katana II
description: A sword made from Kulu-Ya-Ku parts. The thin blade slices through foes with grace.

name: True Devil Slicer+
description: An ancient sword long bathed in the blood of its enemies. Seen as a god on the battlefield.

name: Devil Slicer+
description: An enhanced Eager Cleaver. Its contagious bloodlust infects its wielder's soul.

name: Kulu Slicer+
description: An enhanced Kulu Katana. Even lighter and sharper, it deals a swift, humane death.

name: Chillblade II
description: A new process was used to forge this frozen blade. Its sheath is coated in ice.

name: Kulu Katolos Seif
description: The beak of the Kulu-Ya-Ku, inscribing airy circles as it slices its prey.

name: Rimeblossom
description: The Chillblade's enhanced form carves prey into splendid ice sculptures.

name: Icebloom
description: This upgraded Rimeblossom carves prey into splendid ice sculptures.

name: Frostmoon Paleblade
description: On this unsheathed Lunagaron blade, an icy film, whence comes no hint of warmth.

name: Chillblade I
description: A new process was used to forge this frozen blade. Its sheath is coated in ice.

name: Icebloom+
description: This upgraded Rimeblossom carves prey into splendid ice sculptures.

name: Frostveldt
description: Wrought by expert hands, the undulling iron of this blade sports unthawing icicles.

name: Frostmoon Paleblade+
description: On this unsheathed Lunagaron blade, an icy film, whence comes no hint of warmth.

name: Moonbrand "Lua Cheia"
description: Glimmering with cold-blooded menace in the moonlight, the icy blade seeks hot blood.

name: Wyvern Blade Verde I
description: Dark green blade made from Rathian material. Incredibly sharp and powerful.

name: Wyvern Blade Holly
description: The Wyvern Blade Verde's true heir. Hold the power of the queen in your hands.

name: Wyvern Blade Verde II
description: Dark green blade made from Rathian material. Incredibly sharp and powerful.

name: Wyvern Blade Holly+
description: The Wyvern Blade Verde's true heir. Hold the power of the queen in your hands.

name: Wyvern Blade "Jade"+
description: Its emerald blade leaves a shimmering trail in its wake. A figure depicts a queen's majesty.

name: Wyvern Blade "Jade"
description: Its emerald blade leaves a shimmering trail in its wake. A figure depicts a queen's majesty.

name: Rosenfader+
description: Espinas long sword. Its scarlet blade cleaves everything in range.

name: Wyvern Blade Blood II
description: Once this tough blade drinks the vermilion dusk, the horrific rites can begin.

name: Rosenhimmel
description: The elegance of this long sword helps it to stand out. Its red blade can cut through any shell.

name: Rosenfader
description: Espinas long sword. Its scarlet blade cleaves everything in range.

name: Wyvern Blade Blood I
description: Once this tough blade drinks the vermilion dusk, the horrific rites can begin.

name: Wyvern Blade Maple
description: The enhanced Wyvern Blade Blood. Leaves burn trails behind it with every slash.

name: Wyvern Blade "Scarlet"
description: A wild inferno at a tyrant's command, manifest in this stifling talon of terror.

name: Wyvern Blade "Maple"+
description: The enhanced Wyvern Blade Blood. Leaves burn trails behind it with every slash.

name: Serrated Jaw I
description: A long sword made from a monster's jaw. Turns hunters into butchers.

name: Canine Katana II
description: A long sword made of bones enmeshed with intimidating Jaggi fangs.

name: Serrated Maw
description: The shape of the Serrated Jaw's successor looks like a ferocious dragon's maw.

name: Sunderer
description: A raw bone long sword with rending teeth. Takes more than just a bite of foes.

description: The new and improved Canine Katana. Rips enemies to shreds with ease.

name: Khanga Edge
description: Made of Seregios blades, its golden sheen will never fade no matter how many times it is polished.

name: Black Katana Mk.I
description: Chemically treated Bone Katana made using razor- sharp Hornetaur materials.

name: Flammenschwert I
description: A sword made from Anjanath parts. The power of fire makes it hugely destructive.

name: Fervid Flammenschwert

name: Lohenschwert+
description: An Anjanath's fire within, this forged blade carves prey asunder in a single stroke.

name: Bastine Edge II
description: Made of Barioth parts, this amber blade leaves gouts of bloody ice in its wake.

name: Bastizan Edge
description: An enhanced Bastine Edge. Props to the smith who can forge such cold materials.

name: Bastiana Saber+
description: The cold materials used to make this enhanced Bastizan Edge are extremely difficult to work with.

name: Bastiana Saber
description: The cold materials used to make this enhanced Bastizan Edge are extremely difficult to work with.

name: Bastine Edge I
description: Made of Barioth parts, this amber blade leaves gouts of bloody ice in its wake.

name: Wroggi Sword I
description: This sword benefits from radical technology, allowing poison to collect inside it.

name: Amberfang Gelfidall
description: A Barioth's spirit within, no blade is colder. In its wake, only a single shard of ice.

name: Belladonna's Bite
description: A complex internal structure heightens both the flow of poison and its toxicity.

name: Ananta Blade II
description: A sharp long sword with a paralytic effect. Shocks enemies into submission.

name: Poison Barb
description: An enhanced Wroggi Sword. The poison it generates has become far more potent.

name: Poison Barb+
description: An enhanced Wroggi Sword. The poison it generates has become far more potent.

name: Wroggi Sword II
description: This sword benefits from radical technology, allowing poison to collect inside it.

name: Shadow Slasher
description: A blade fit for delivering punishment. This sword won't tolerate any wrongdoing.

name: Spiritbinder
description: Dubbed the mercy sword for its painless delivery by rendering prey unconscious.

name: Shadow Slasher+
description: A blade fit for delivering punishment. This sword won't tolerate any wrongdoing.

name: Bone Scythe I
description: A sword made of solid bone. Use it to hack at enemies to your heart's content.

name: Bone Reaper
description: A sword made of modified bone. Each primal slash can cleave rocks in two.

name: Spark Slicer I
description: A sword made of Tobi-Kadachi scales. Each strike is like a mighty flash of lightning.

name: Bone Scythe II
description: A sword made of solid bone. Use it to hack at enemies to your heart's content.

name: Shocking Slicer
description: Strike foes down where they stand with this sword. Truly a blessing from the heavens.

name: Shocking Slicer+
description: Strike foes down where they stand with this sword. Truly a blessing from the heavens.

name: Shockstrike
description: Thunder rumbles; lightning crashes. A stroke of this blade renders all unto ashes.

name: Jyura Saber I
description: A sword made from Jyuratodus parts. All the mud has been polished away, thankfully.

name: Shockstrike+
description: Thunder rumbles; lightning crashes. A stroke of this blade renders all unto ashes.

name: Jyura Reaver+

name: Valtos Slough+

name: Anteka Blade I

description: A long sword made of Anteka parts that trades flashiness for top-tier ease of use.

description: The Anteka Blade's final form. Gives you the feral spirit of a cornered animal.

name: King Anteka Blade
description: An Anteka Blade fashioned by a master forger, then honed by a master in battle.

name: Illusory Frilled Slash

name: Frilled Slash II

name: Nightmare Frilled Slash+

name: Drowning Shaft I
description: A long sword made of Royal Ludroth sponges. Its blows drown even landlocked foes.

description: A sword made from sharp, frosty nails, raking the lives of all they target.

name: Bloom Snow Slash
description: A sword made from sharp, frosty nails, raking the lives of all they target.

name: Drowning Shaft II
description: A long sword made of Royal Ludroth sponges. Its blows drown even landlocked foes.

name: Flicker Blizzard Slash

name: Douser Bardiche+
description: Nobody can turn the tide against the Drowning Shaft's final incarnation.

name: Wasserfallis
description: With a single stroke, a mighty wave swells and sends all to the abyss.

name: Wasserfallis+
description: With a single stroke, a mighty wave swells and sends all to the abyss.

name: Golm Cutter
description: A sublime sword, carved from a solid metal, whose blade downs all in its path.

name: Golm Cutter+
description: A sublime sword, carved from a solid metal, whose blade downs all in its path.

name: Arzuros Naginata II
description: A sword that blends Arzuros plate with ore. Used by strength-focused barbarians.

name: Arzuros Strikequill+
description: The Arzuros Naginata's final form. The scabbard's pattern comes from a famous monk.

name: Arzuros Naginata I
description: A sword that blends Arzuros plate with ore. Used by strength-focused barbarians.

name: Arzuros Telltail
description: A weapon alive with positive energy, whose scabbard was adorned by a famous monk.

name: Arzuros Strikequill
description: The Arzuros Naginata's final form. The scabbard's pattern comes from a famous monk.

name: Wind Thief Scimitar II
description: A sword made from an Izuchi tail. Easy to use, its thin blade is very versatile.

name: Gale Scimitar
description: Said to have been favored by an old vigilante hero. A blade as swift as the wind.

name: Gale Scimitar+
description: Said to have been favored by an old vigilante hero. A blade as swift as the wind.

name: Wind Thief Scimitar I
description: A sword made from an Izuchi tail. Easy to use, its thin blade is very versatile.

name: Reaper Blade Boldus
description: Dormant within lies the heart of justice. Defiant of the raging wind. Cuts down unrest.

name: Tormentor
description: The Dark Scythe's heir takes prey's breath away literally.

name: Tormentor+
description: The Dark Scythe's heir takes prey's breath away literally.

name: Darkness Within
description: A great scythe said to cleave not only the flesh of dragons, but their spirit, too.

description: A great scythe said to cleave not only the flesh of dragons, but their spirit, too.

name: Crab Cutter
description: A splendid scythe made from Daimyo Hermitaur claw, which rips through hide and flesh.

name: Dark Scythe I
description: A sickle-shaped death scythe that can cut wyverns in two. Made from treated material.

name: Crab Cutter+
description: A splendid scythe made from Daimyo Hermitaur claw, which rips through hide and flesh.

name: Ceanataur Cutter+

description: A scythe made from Shogun Ceanataur parts that makes for a potent trump card.

name: Killer's Sickle
description: This enhanced Shogun Cutter is a cleaver sure to make any battle deadlier.

name: Scythe of Menace I
description: Laced with poisons created in absolute secrecy, this is a weapon for assassination.

name: Scythe of Menace II
description: Laced with poisons created in absolute secrecy, this is a weapon for assassination.

name: Big Menacing Scythe
description: The Scythe of Menace's final form. Once made taboo for being so brutal to use.

name: Jinxmonger
description: Upgrade of the Big Menacing Scythe. Once made taboo for being so brutal to use.

name: Malicemonger

name: Sinister Long Sword I
description: Magnamalo's fury incarnate. This sword overwhelms its prey with ease.

description: Magnamalo's roars awaken dark forces whose bloodlust may never be satisfied.

name: Sinister Long Sword II
description: Magnamalo's fury incarnate. This sword overwhelms its prey with ease.

name: Sinister Shade Sword+
description: Magnamalo's roars awaken dark forces whose bloodlust may never be satisfied.

name: Tormented Shade Sword
description: The flames of war quenched by naught but thirst and sorrow, the evil finally vanquished.

name: Devil's Deal
description: The blue flame on this blade is the result of purifying the malice of a long-departed soul.

name: Stahlfakt
description: A black, accursed sword that sends foes hellward before its wicked eye can blink.

name: Stahlfakt+
description: A black, accursed sword that sends foes hellward before its wicked eye can blink.

name: Stahlurteil
description: Eternal anguish beyond hell awaits victims of this jet-black demon blade.

name: La Justicire
description: An iridescent, blessed sword that parts foes from life in a stroke of blissful beauty.

name: Le Dcalogue
description: Golden blade arbitrating creation, shining morbidly with an aurora's iridescence.

name: Demon Halberd I
description: Made using the secrets of Eastern monks. Imbued with the power of great warriors.

name: Demon Halberd II
description: Made using the secrets of Eastern monks. Imbued with the power of great warriors.

name: Great Demon Halberd
description: The Demon Halberd's final form, a long sword passed on from generations of heroes.

name: Great Demon Halberd+
description: The Demon Halberd's final form, a long sword passed on from generations of heroes.

name: Evil Demon Halberd
description: The Demon Halberd's final form. The glorious blade dashes evil without so much as a nick.

name: Demonlord Halberd

name: Azure Elder Long Sword II
description: Like Wind Serpent Ibushi, this sword can call forth the power of the wind.

name: Azure Elder Long Sword I
description: Like Wind Serpent Ibushi, this sword can call forth the power of the wind.

name: Abyssal Gale Sword
description: With the power of the wind, this long sword could turn the entire world to dust.

name: Pandemonium
description: A sword cleansing corruption to create a pure world. Its blade shall eventually slay gods.

name: Thunderbolt Long Sword I
description: A two-bladed sword imbued with the shocking might of Narwa's terrifying wrath.

name: Abyssal Storm Sword
description: With Narwa's immense power, this sword could plunge the world into eternal darkness.

name: Torrential Hail
description: A sword that protects the weak and fells the strong. Its blade shall eventually slay gods.

name: Rookslayer Saber II
description: A riotous Bazelgeuse sword whose every swing triggers a nigh-suicidal explosion.

description: Enhanced Rookslayer Saber. Burns foes to the ground in the blink of an eye.

description: A riotous Bazelgeuse sword whose every swing triggers a nigh-suicidal explosion.

name: Bazel Jarre Blazer
description: Enhanced Rookslayer Saber. Burns foes to the ground in the blink of an eye.

name: Icesteel Blade I
description: Freezing long sword. The blizzard it causes leaves none alive.

name: Daora's Raid
description: The Icesteel Blade's final form. So cold it could freeze time itself.

name: Daora's Raid+
description: The Icesteel Blade's final form. So cold it could freeze time itself.

name: Daora's Storm
description: Neither fear, nor dreadnor life itselfexist before this blade's absolute stillness.

name: Imperial Saber I
description: A crimson edge as mighty as its name suggests. Foes are destined to burn and bleed.

name: Imperial Shimmer+
description: The Imperial Saber's final form torches anything that comes within its reach.

name: Imperial Shimmer
description: The Imperial Saber's final form torches anything that comes within its reach.

name: Imperial Flickerflame
description: Born in the fire of the Emperor of Flame, one scorching slash will sever anything in a flash.

name: Mirage Finsword I
description: A semi-invisible sword made of Chameleos parts. Good for hit jobs.

name: Phantom Mirage
description: The Mirage Finsword's final form. Rumored to have once been used in assassinations.

name: Phantom Mirage+
description: The Mirage Finsword's final form. Rumored to have once been used in assassinations.

name: Skulduggery
description: A magical sword forbidden in many lands, used for assassination and feared by royalty and nobility.

name: Redwing Long Sword I
description: A mysterious sword made from Valstrax parts. Glows as red as the blood it spills.

name: Reddnaught Blade
description: This sword emits a piercing red glow, much like a comet racing through the heavens.

name: Red Flash
description: This sword emits a piercing red glow, much like a comet racing through the heavens.

name: Abyssal Flicker
description: Fourteen terrors from the black abyss. The second was a fork of deadly lightning.

name: Cawscythe I
description: A haunting long sword that delivers a message of death across the land.

name: Cawscythe II
description: A haunting long sword that delivers a message of death across the land.

name: Cawscythe III
description: A haunting long sword that delivers a message of death across the land.

name: Squawkscythe
description: The Cawscythe's final form. Reeks of death from all the lives it's taken.

name: Screakscythe
description: A blade blackened by the untold number of souls it's reaped, now the dark master of ruin.

name: Hand-Me-Down Sword I
description: An old village sword. It's not steel, but it's clearly been well taken care of.

name: Hand-Me-Down Sword II
description: An old village sword. It's not steel, but it's clearly been well taken care of.

name: Squawkscythe+
description: The Cawscythe's final form. Reeks of death from all the lives it's taken.

name: Kamura's Legacy
description: The blade that brought forth true power in the guardian of the Flame of Peace.

name: Kamura's Inheritance+
description: This tempered blade lives up to its name. It will surely be used for years to come.

name: Kamura's Inheritance
description: This tempered blade lives up to its name. It will surely be used for years to come.

name: Royal Order's Claymore
description: A long sword used by knights of the Order. Only those brave of heart may wield it.

name: Royal Order's Claymore+
description: A long sword used by knights of the Order. Only those brave of heart may wield it.

name: Antique Machina LS
description: A long sword of emerald and gold furnished with a mechanism utilizing afflicted energy.

name: Rampage Blade I
description: A blade that can change the world. Its strange power slays foes left and right.

name: Rampage Blade II
description: A blade that can change the world. Its strange power slays foes left and right.

name: Rampage Blade V
description: A blade that can change the world. Its strange power slays foes left and right.

name: Rampage Blade III
description: A blade that can change the world. Its strange power slays foes left and right.

name: Rampage Blade IV
description: A blade that can change the world. Its strange power slays foes left and right.

name: Rampage Blade S
description: Nobody can escape change. The wise understand this, and thus accept their fate.

name: Azure Star Blade I
description: A long sword that gleams as the azure star. It shines brighter with each wish granted.

name: Azure Star "Dragon Dance"
description: Gleams blue with hopes and dreams. Its every swing the image of a dragon's flight.
